comments:
Right clicking various nodes in the context menu fails. The context menu fails to appear and the editor window goes blank.

To reproduce:
1. Create a new instance of uk.gov.cfh.mim.6.1.01/Mif/COCD_TP145001UK02-AuthorSDS.mif
2. Load the instance, go to the design view, and right-click the root node.
3. The following exception occurs.

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument cannot be null

fixed; problem was in the change to the datatypes model
